thread.title: Free Research Reports on These Investment Brokerage Stocks -- GAIN Capital, Interactive Brokers, LPL Financial, and TD Ameritrade

author: cnbc.com
title: Free Research Reports on These Investment Brokerage Stocks -- GAIN Capital, Interactive Brokers, LPL Financial, and TD Ameritrade
text:
NEW YORK, April 19, 2018 /PRNewswire/ --
WallStEquities.com strives to bring the best free research to the investment community. Today we are offering reports on GCAP, IBKR, LPLA, and AMTD which can be accessed for free by signing up to www.wallstequities.com/registration . This morning, WallStEquities.com monitors the recent performance of GAIN Capital Holdings Inc. (NYSE: GCAP), Interactive Brokers Group Inc. (NASDAQ: IBKR), LPL Financial Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ: LPLA), and TD Ameritrade Holding Corp. (NASDAQ: AMTD). These companies operate in the National Investment Brokerage industry, which typically offers services, such as tax planning, estate planning, legal assistance, and industry research, for business owners. All you have to do is sign up today for this free limited time offer by clicking the link below.
www.wallstequities.com/registration
GAIN Capital Holdings
New Jersey headquartered GAIN Capital Holdings Inc.'s stock finished Wednesday's session 0.37% lower at $8.09 with a total trading volume of 381,706 shares. Over the last month and the previous three months, the Company's shares have advanced 12.83% and 1.38%, respectively. Additionally, the stock has gained 12.36% over the past year. Shares of the Company are trading above their 50-day and 200-day moving averages by 14.30% and 14.45%, respectively. Moreover, shares of GAIN Capital, which together with its subsidiary, provides trading services and solutions to retail, institutional, and futures service customers worldwide, have a Relative Strength Index (RSI) of 73.02.
On April 12 th , 2018, GAIN Capital announced that it will report its Q1 2018 earnings on April 26 th , 2018, after the US market closes. A conference call will be held on the same day at 4:30 pm ET to discuss the results. A live audio webcast of the call, as well as a PDF copy of the earnings presentation, will be available under the Investor Relations section of the Company's website. Get the full research report on GCAP for free by clicking below at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=GCAP
Interactive Brokers Group
Shares in Connecticut headquartered Interactive Brokers Group Inc. declined 3.33%, ending yesterday's session at $71.92. A total volume of 1.68 million shares was traded, which was above their three months average volume of 717,410 shares. The stock has gained 2.01% in the past month, 14.87% in the previous three months, and 106.73% over the past year. The Company's shares are trading 4.62% above their 50-day moving average and 31.69% above their 200-day moving average. Moreover, shares of Interactive Brokers, which operates as an automated electronic broker in approximately 120 electronic exchanges and market centers worldwide, have an RSI of 54.78.
On April 17 th , 2018, Interactive Brokers' Board of Directors declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.10 per share. This dividend is payable on June 14 th , 2018, to shareholders of record as of June 01 st , 2018. Find your free research report on IBKR at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=IBKR
LPL Financial Holdings
On Wednesday, Massachusetts-based LPL Financial Holdings Inc.'s stock rose 2.58%, to close the day at $59.96. A total volume of 1.21 million shares was traded, which was above their three months average volume of 923,270 shares. The Company's shares have advanced 0.69% in the previous three months and 57.58% over the past year. The stock is trading 11.64% above its 200-day moving average. Additionally, shares of LPL Financial have an RSI of 49.28.
On April 02 nd , 2018, LPL Financial LLC, a wholly owned subsidiary of LPL Financial Holdings, announced that it will report its Q1 financial results after the market closes on May 03 rd , 2018. The Company will host a conference call at 5:00 p.m. EDT on the same day to discuss the results. The conference call will be webcast simultaneously under the Investor Relations section of the Company's website.
On April 10 th , 2018, research firm Bernstein initiated an 'Outperform' rating on the Company's stock. Sign up today for the free research report on LPLA at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=LPLA
TD Ameritrade Holding
Shares in Nebraska headquartered TD Ameritrade Holding Corp. ended the day 1.45% lower at $59.69. A total volume of 3.18 million shares was traded. The stock has gained 8.51% in the previous three months and 59.81% over the past year. The Company's shares are trading above their 50-day and 200-day moving averages by 2.43% and 17.22%, respectively. Furthermore, shares of TD Ameritrade have an RSI of 52.79.
On April 09 th , 2018, TD Ameritrade announced that it will issue a post-market press release of its Q2 FY18 financial results on April 23 rd , 2018. The Company will hold its quarterly conference call on April 24 th , 2018, at 8:30 a.m. EDT to discuss the results and related matters.
On April 10 th , 2018, research firm Bernstein initiated an 'Outperform' rating on the Company's stock, with a target price of $40 per share. Wall St. Equities' research coverage also includes the downloadable free report on AMTD at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=AMTD
--
Wall St. Equities :
Wall St. Equities (WSE) produces regular sponsored and non-sponsored reports, articles, stock market blogs, and popular investment newsletters covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and micro-cap stocks. WSE has two distinct and independent departments. One department produces non-sponsored analyst certified content generally in the form of press releases, articles and reports covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and the other produces sponsored content (in most cases not reviewed by a registered analyst), which typically consists of compensated investment newsletters, articles and reports covering listed stocks and micro-caps. Such sponsored content is outside the scope of procedures detailed below.
WSE has not been compensated; directly or indirectly; for producing or publishing this document.
PRESS RELEASE PROCEDURES :
The non-sponsored content contained herein has been prepared by a writer (the "Author") and is fact checked and reviewed by a third-party research service company (the "Reviewer") represented by a credentialed financial analyst [for further information on analyst credentials, please email info@wallstequities.com . Rohit Tuli, a CFA® charterholder (the "Sponsor"), provides necessary guidance in preparing the document templates. The Reviewer has reviewed and revised the content, as necessary, based on publicly available information which is believed to be reliable. The Reviewer has only independently reviewed the information provided by the Author according to the procedures outlined by WSE.
